channel.title: Machine Learning on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on A Hugo website

item.title: Principle component analysis vs support vector machine
item.description: Background This spreadsheet contains urine proteomic data normalized to creatinine (relative fluorescent units of protein per mg of creatinine) with 4 groups: 1) Febrile UTI), 2) nonfebrile UTI, 3) culture negative pyuria (white blood cells in the urine) and 4) culture negative normal UA We are looking for a panel of protein/creatinine levels that predicts UTI (group 1 and 2 combined) when compared to both culture negative pyuria (group 3) and culture negative, normal UA (group 4) individually and in combination
